comments:
Description:
IllegalArgumentException when set custom format for datetime parameter

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a datetime parameter
2. Click Change button in format string as.
3. Select custom and input MM.dd.yyyy, click OK

Expected result:
No errros

Actual result:
